data.fullContent: Kanna is a Tamil film that was released in 2007. The film tells the story of a girl who takes a school trip to another city. She falls desperately in love with her tour guide, but she and he lose contact when she must return home. Eventually, she runs away from home to find him again.
data.answer: 卡纳是2007年上映的泰米尔电影。这部电影讲述了一个女孩参加学校组织的旅行到另一个城市的故事。她绝望地爱上了她的导游，但当她必须回家时，她和他失去了联系。最后，她离家出走去找他。
